translation.en: I'm not gonna lie, man, this shit is crazy.
[laughing] This shit is fucking fun as hell.
[voice on speaker] All seat belts checked. All clear.
[interviewer] What do you think of Astroworld so far?
It's one of the best albums of all time.
The new one with me and Frank Ocean is...
translation.ko: 새로운 시도였고 프랭크 오션이 피처링한 곡은...

translation.en: I feel like, at some points in life,
you have to just be extreme.
And sometimes, you have to take...
Astro was a concept I've been working on since...
I was about six years old.
it's some of the best moments of my life.
that these were times that you have to really...
[Travis] I'm not done with these niggas, man.
I'm not done with these niggas. Watch out.
translation.ko: - 트래비스! - 아직 안 끝났어 잘 봐

translation.en: I'm trying to feel the love. Watch out.
translation.ko: 사랑을 느껴 보는 거야 잘 봐

translation.en: I don't wanna see nobody near me. Everybody back up!
Open up! Open this shit up!
Where the fuck my ragers at? Y'all niggas get in control, man. Back up!
translation.ko: 내 광팬들은 어딨어? 이 인간들 좀 통제해 뒤로 빠지라고 해!

translation.en: -[security] Let's go! Move back! -[Travis] Give it to me.
They said we was going too crazy, so we had to get the fuck out.
translation.ko: 우리가 너무 흥분했다고 - 나가랬어요 - 왜 우리가 쫓겨나?

translation.en: [announcer] If you stay here, this show will likely get canceled.
translation.ko: 계속 버티고 있으면 공연을 취소할 겁니다

translation.en: [fan] She couldn't survive the Rodeo. Not everybody meant for this.
translation.ko: 로데오 투어에서 낙오됐어 아무나 즐길 순 없지

translation.en: [fan] Travis motherfucking Scott, greatest live performer on this planet!
translation.ko: 트래비스 스콧의 라이브 공연은 세계 최고예요!

translation.en: Got a problem with La Flame, got a problem with me.
translation.ko: 라 플레임한테 불만 있으면 나한테 불만 있는 거예요

translation.en: [fan] Fuck anybody that say bad stuff about La Flame.

translation.en: We gonna kill, nigga. For La Flame, nigga.

translation.en: [fan] This is what happens at a Travis Scott gig.
[fan] We just survived Travis, you know,
translation.ko: 우린 휴스턴의 미주리 시티 공연을 버텨 냈어요

translation.en: real Mo City, Houston, nigga shit. Come on, bro.
translation.ko: 우린 휴스턴의 미주리 시티 공연을 버텨 냈어요 그 정도라고요

translation.en: For those who don't know, my name is Travis fucking Scott!

translation.en: [Travis] Everybody take two steps back, man.
Come on. There's two more people on the ground.

translation.en: Back the fuck up, man! Please, just one second.
Help him out. Help him up.
Help him out. Back up. Get back up.
If everybody good, put one hand up to the sky.

translation.en: One hand up to the sky.
[granny] Look, he taller than you. [guy] He is tall, yeah.
-[guy] That's where you stayed? -[Travis] No, I used to sleep in here.

translation.en: Me and my brother shared this room right here.
translation.ko: 우리 형제는 이 방을 같이 썼죠

translation.en: That's just how it used to be in here.
Made my shit right here, boy.
This shit used to be the livest, though, nigga!
-I don't want that. -You don't want this picture?
I can't. I don't want to lose it.
-Do you have a wallet? -I got a wallet.
That will keep him close to your heart.
[Travis] I thought it was one of them big pictures.
[granny] No, it's a little baby picture.
H-Town shit! Know what I'm talking about!
[manager] Kids push up against the front
translation.ko: "버즈 아이 뷰 투어" 팬들이 앞으로 밀고 나와

translation.en: and spread all the way across that and fill in the whole front floor.
translation.ko: 사방으로 퍼져서 앞쪽을 가득 채울 거야

translation.en: So the pressure becomes very great up against the barricade.
You will see a lot of crowd surfers in general,
but also a lot of kids are just trying to get out
to safety 'cause they can't breathe, it's so compact.

translation.en: Before I go to this next song,
I'm gonna have to invite just a couple more people
down here to rage with these motherfuckers.
Whoa, here they come. Ray, Tyler, get it!
translation.ko: 저기 온다 레이, 타일러, 판 벌리자!

translation.en: Film it! Bizzy! Los! I see 'em!

translation.ko: 저기 있어 경호원, 이쪽으로 보내 줘!

translation.en: Hey, yo. Turn the lights off.
Hey, yo. Turn the lights off.
Make it completely black. Turn the lights off the stage.

translation.en: Why are you not on your job?
-We are on the job. -'Cause it's a security guy
with a broken leg out there.
So, we'll go out here just ready to talk to them.
We're gonna arrest you. Take you to county jail.
Travis was immediately arrested as soon as he walked off the stage.
[newsreader] Travis Scott was arrested this Saturday night.
Wild night in Northwest Arkansas lands a famous rapper leaving in handcuffs.
translation.ko: 유명 래퍼가 아칸소에서 열띤 공연 끝에 수갑을 찼습니다

translation.en: I don't even know how to-- Words can't describe how I feel.
translation.ko: 지금 심정은 말로 표현이 안 돼요

translation.en: Survived, I survived. It's all good.
The best fucking concert in my whole life.
He changes your heart, makes you feel loved.
translation.ko: 생각을 바꿔 주고 사랑을 느끼게 해요

translation.en: -It was mental. -I thought I was gonna die in your fucking show.
Every time I listen to his music, I'll never forget that shit.
translation.ko: 트래비스의 음악은 한 번 들으면 못 잊어요

translation.en: [fan] You can fall and everyone will pick you up.
It's weird how one person's music can turn everyone into such a family.
translation.ko: 한 가수의 음악으로 모두가 가족이 되다니 신기하죠

translation.en: The most lit shit I've seen in a minute.
Throughout high school and shit, I was, like, super depressed,
translation.ko: 고등학생일 때 너무 우울했고 의지할 사람도 없었죠

translation.en: and I had no one to turn to,
and... he was the first person to let me know that I wasn't alone.
translation.ko: 근데 트래비스 덕에 처음으로 혼자가 아니라고 느꼈어요

translation.en: I fucking love you, bro. Thanks for saving my life.
-[guy 1] There you go. Let's go. -[guy 2] Oh, bro.
-[guy 1] Let's fucking go. -[guy 2] They let him out.
[Travis laughs] Them cops said some shit about that.

translation.en: I just hate fucking getting arrested, man. That shit's wack.

translation.en: Again, we think, if this went to court,
we don't think there's a crime committed.
During the show, you have the First Amendment
to protect you, first of all.
Second of all, you didn't say anything.

translation.en: And there wasn't even a riot, but if there was one, you didn't incite.

You know, I've known this nigga since we was like nine or ten years old

to see him literally, like, every step of the way...

he sent me one of his mixtapes when I was, like, at school

what it is now... I always knew, you know?
